content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-christmas-tree-gnome/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level intermediate this pattern uses the chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet decrease slip_stitch working in front or back loop only and magic_ring materials needed size 4 yarn 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors polyfil hot glue optional fabric paint this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2022 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
